description:
Extend your winter range, whether you're a budding snowshoe enthusiast or a seasoned hiker. These snowshoes have a narrower shape designed to suit women's foot shape and stride pattern. The soft-pivot harness system moves smoothly through 180-degrees for comfortable walking on undulating ground.

  • Lightweight aluminum frame
  • Entech decking is lightweight and abrasion-resistant
  • Asymmetric harness fits women's narrower feet well
  • Spin binding ratcheting cable cinches down with a quick twist
  • Toe and heel crampons provide traction on slopes
  • Heel riser eases calf muscles when going uphill
name: GV Snowshoes Active Mountain SPIN Snowshoes - Women's
